body.name: Acrylic Monitor Stand, Pink Computer Riser, Pink Desk Riser, Pink Acrylic Laptop Stand, Acrylic Monitor Stand for Desk, Pink Monitor Stand, Monitor Riser Pink, Valentine's Gift
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 51 mins
features: Stunning Clarity in Pink: The clear pink acrylic construction not only provides a touch of sophistication but also offers crystal-clear transparency. This sleek and modern design will effortlessly complement any office or home decor.

Ergonomic Elevation: Say goodbye to neck and back strain! Our monitor stand raises your screen to eye level, promoting better posture and reducing the risk of discomfort during long work hours. It's an essential ergonomic addition to your workspace.

Space-Saving Design: The compact and minimalist design of this monitor stand maximizes your desk space. You can easily slide your keyboard, mouse, or other items beneath it, keeping your workspace neat and organized.
Sturdy and Durable: Crafted from high-quality acrylic material, this stand is not only aesthetically pleasing but also built to last. It can comfortably support most monitor sizes and weights.
Versatile Use: Beyond supporting your monitor, this stand can also accommodate laptops, printers, or other accessories. Its versatility ensures it can adapt to your changing needs.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.9 4.9 out of 5 stars 18 ratings 4.9 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and super sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I feel like this is one of those items you don’t realize you need until you have it! I didn’t realize how much I was looking down to look at my laptop screen until I am now looking forward!The stand is super thick and sturdy.The area underneath is large enough that you can fit your stapler and ruler, pens, pencils, pads of paper, sticky note dispensers the possibilities are endless. Actually creates more desk space! Things that were out in the middle of your desk can now be tucked underneath your computer! My laptop is more than an inch wider than the stand, but it is still very sturdy and stable. It also hangs off the back many inches but again it is still very stable. I love it. I honestly never even considered a laptop stand but I love it!I use a separate keyboard I don’t think it would be comfortable using the laptop keyboard, on top of the stand it would be too tall. my full-size keyboard does not fit underneath the stand either just for reference.I worried that the hot pink would be obnoxious, but with the laptop on top, you barely even notice the pink. You can see it on the front edge but other than that it’s not obnoxious at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this laptop riser, and here are the reasons why:1. I almost didn't order it for my bedroom, because I have just a little pink, but more red accents and wanted to bring in the red more..and guess what!? To me, on my white wood desk, with white leather chair and lamp on it..it has a more subtle red undertone! This laptop riser looks clear with a subtle red hue..not an obvious coloring..which is very attractive and looks and feels solid and upscale.2. NO assembling! At All. All in one piece and ready to use!3. Perfect height and width. I have a laptop with a seperate keyboard I use..which made my laptop to far away..if this makes sense, and I had trouble seeing my screen..well, now my laptop is higher over my keyboard closer to me!4. No more looking down.. obviously..not good on the back when working from home.I was worried to order as I am picky with keeping my decor a certain upscale/ cute/ comfortable/ while being useful theme..this riser fits the bill for working at home while looking cute needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for work from home professionals
reviews.reviewText: I noticed that when I was taking my video calls I was never aligned with the camera. I ordered the NovaMode acrylic monitor stand to see if it would help fix that minor issue. I was pleased at how well it helped. I am now at perfect eye level when sitting at my desk. An added benefit is I gained extra working space because of the lift. The stand is well crafted and my laptop fits perfectly on it. I love the pink color. If you do not like pink items then this would not be for you because it is very pink. The color adds some fun and brings out my office space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to our office.
reviews.reviewText: This acrylic stand is such a nice addition to our office desk. It not only adds some color to the desk, but is functional as it adds some space to the desk. It is very sturdy and I like how it is clear, so it is easy to identify what is under it so nothing gets lost there. It can hold the weight of my computer monitor very well and there is still more space to hold other knick knacks on the sides. The only thing that I would prefer with this product is straight edges instead of curved because it is very easy for items to fall off the side if they’re placed near the edge, but it is aesthetic with the curved edges, so it is still a very nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s study and looks very nice.
reviews.reviewText: The stand is a bright colorful shade of pink. It really looks modern and professional. The acrylic is thick and plenty strong enough to hold a laptop or monitor. The edges and corners are well defined but not sharp. It’s formed perfectly so your laptop or monitor sits completely horizontal. It raises the laptop to an ideal height for viewing if you’re using a standard height desk or table.I was using a puzzle box to raise my laptop to a good viewing height but this stand is perfect in height and looks really nice. It also creates a little space to store small items you might need as your working or when you’re just having fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars strong, pink, and makes room
reviews.reviewText: i got this for work. i use it just a bit differant than what it is designed for, but, it works so perfect. I have a laptop that uses a USB C docking station, so i have the laptop plus 2 more monitors. this lifts the laptop up so that it is more level to the other monitors and i dont have to look down to it. and i have more room on my desk because now that opens space for other items like my notepads, and just other stuff on my desk. my space is at one heck of a premium on my desk and this helps me make more room and help me see my laptop screen better as a monitor. love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully manufactured, very sturdy, does not fit DELL Latitude
reviews.reviewText: The transparent acrylic stand is heavy-duty and good for even the biggest monitor you might have.The unfortunate news is that the standard DELL Latitude laptop is about 1/2 inch wider than the riser allows. The riser doesn't have cutouts for USB ports, so to plug in my USB-C monitor on the side would be impossible to connect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Acrylic, Beautifully Designed Riser for Desk
reviews.reviewText: This may be the most beautiful thing I've ever seen on a work desk. What a nice touch to add attractive color to a high quality monitor riser. It raises the desktop monitor and simultaneously adds space to the desk. It is smooth 0.4 inch thick acrylic in a polished sleek shape. It easily holds a large monitor in a stable position and height, and it could be used for many other office or home devices as well. Everyone who has seen it on my desk has commented on "the look". Highly recommend!
